ASSUMPTIONS ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- - The `ContractAddresses.CREATOR` is a trusted EOA or multisig that won't act maliciously before all contracts are deployed. - The LINK token address is correct and constant. - External contracts (ContractAddresses.GAME, ContractAddresses.BONDS, ContractAddresses.COIN, etc.) are correctly implemented. - Chainlink VRF coordinator and price feeds are trusted oracles. GAS CONSIDERATIONS ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- - wireVrf() adds the ContractAddresses.GAME consumer and sets VRF config; should only be called once. - Should only be called once during initial setup. - Emergency functions are designed for rare use and prioritize safety over gas.","errors":{"AlreadyWired()":[{"details":"Attempting to re-wire an already-wired component."}],"BondsNotReady()":[{"details":"Bonds contract not ready for requested operation."}],"FeedHealthy()":[{"details":"Price feed is healthy; emergency recovery not allowed."}],"NotWired()":[{"details":"Required component not yet wired."}],"ZeroAddress()":[{"details":"A required address parameter was zero."}]},"events":{"ConsumerAdded(address)":{"params":{"consumer":"Address of the newly added consumer."}},"CoordinatorUpdated(address,uint256)":{"params":{"coordinator":"New coordinator address.","subId":"Associated subscription ID."}},"EmergencyRecovered(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"fundedAmount":"LINK transferred to new subscription.","newCoordinator":"New coordinator address.","newSubId":"New subscription ID."}},"LinkCreditRecorded(address,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"amount":"BURNIE amount credited.","minted":"True if credited to live ContractAddresses.COIN, false if presale-escrowed.","player":"Address receiving the credit."}},"LinkEthFeedUpdated(address)":{"params":{"feed":"New feed address (zero disables oracle)."}},"SubscriptionCancelled(uint256,address)":{"params":{"subId":"The cancelled subscription ID.","to":"Address receiving the LINK refund."}},"SubscriptionCreated(uint256)":{"params":{"subId":"The newly created subscription ID."}},"SubscriptionShutdown(uint256,address,uint256)":{"params":{"subId":"The shutdown subscription ID.","sweptAmount":"LINK amount swept.","to":"Address receiving the LINK."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"emergencyRecover(address,bytes32)":{"details":"Emergency recovery path when Chainlink VRF becomes unavailable.      EXECUTION ORDER:      1. Verify 3-day stall via ContractAddresses.GAME.rngStalledForThreeDays()      2. Cancel old subscription (LINK refunds to this contract)      3. Create new subscription on new coordinator      4. Add ContractAddresses.GAME as consumer      5. Push new config to game      6. Transfer any LINK balance to new subscription      SECURITY NOTES:      - 3-day stall requirement prevents premature migration.      - try/catch on cancelSubscription handles edge cases.      - New coordinator/keyHash must be non-zero.      - Game is updated atomically.","params":{"newCoordinator":"Address of the new VRF coordinator.","newKeyHash":"Key hash for the new coordinator."},"returns":{"newSubId":"The newly created subscription ID."}},"onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Called automatically when LINK is transferred via transferAndCall().      FLOW:      1. Validate sender is LINK token contract      2. Forward LINK to VRF subscription      3. Calculate reward multiplier based on subscription balance      4. Convert LINK to ETH-equivalent using price feed      5. Credit BURNIE reward to donor (live ContractAddresses.COIN)      SECURITY NOTES:      - msg.sender validation prevents fake LINK attacks.      - GameOver guard prevents donations after ContractAddresses.GAME ends.      - Multiplier decreases as subscription fills (incentivizes early donations).      - No rewards if price feed unavailable.","params":{"amount":"Amount of LINK received.","from":"Address that sent the LINK."}},"setLinkEthPriceFeed(address)":{"details":"Zero address disables oracle-based valuation (LINK donations earn no rewards).      Only replaceable if current feed is unhealthy (prevents unnecessary changes).      SECURITY NOTES:      - FeedHealthy guard prevents changing a working feed.      - Decimal normalization handles feeds with different precisions.      - Invalid feed data (answer <= 0) causes _linkAmountToEth to return 0.","params":{"feed":"New price feed address (zero to disable)."}},"shutdownAndRefund(address)":{"details":"Final cleanup function. No VRF stall required \u2014 only ContractAddresses.GAME-over flag.      SECURITY NOTES:      - Requires gameOverEntropyAttempted() to be true.      - LINK refunded to specified target address.      - Sets subscriptionId to 0 to prevent re-use.","params":{"target":"Address to receive the LINK refund."}},"stakeGameEthToStEth(uint256)":{"details":"Converts idle ETH to yield-bearing stETH.","params":{"amount":"Amount of ETH to stake."}},"swapGameEthForStEth(uint256)":{"details":"Allows owner to provide ETH liquidity in exchange for stETH yield.      SECURITY NOTES:      - msg.value must exactly equal amount parameter.      - stETH sent to msg.sender (owner), not arbitrary address.      - Game contract validates the swap internally.","params":{"amount":"Amount of ETH to swap."}},"wireVrf(address,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"If subId is zero, a new subscription is created on the coordinator.      Subsequent calls must match existing config.","params":{"bondKeyHash_":"VRF key hash (gas lane).","coordinator_":"VRF coordinator address.","subId":"Existing VRF subscription ID (0 to create)."}}},"stateVariables":{"PRICE_COIN_UNIT":{"details":"BURNIE conversion constant: 1000 BURNIE = 1e21 base units (18 decimals).      Used to convert ETH-equivalent value to BURNIE credit amount."},"coordinator":{"details":"Can be updated during emergency recovery (stall-gated)."},"linkEthPriceFeed":{"details":"Zero address disables oracle-based valuation.      Only replaceable if current feed is unhealthy."},"linkEthPriceScale":{"details":"Scale factor for price normalization to 18 decimals."},"linkEthPriceScaleUp":{"details":"True if price needs to be scaled up (feed decimals < 18)."},"subscriptionId":{"details":"Created during first wireVrf(); can change during emergency recovery."},"vrfKeyHash":{"details":"Different coordinators may require different key hashes."}},"title":"DegenerusAdmin","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"ConsumerAdded(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a consumer is added to the VRF subscription."},"CoordinatorUpdated(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when the VRF coordinator is updated."},"EmergencyRecovered(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted after emergency VRF recovery completes."},"LinkCreditRecorded(address,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when LINK donation credit is recorded."},"LinkEthFeedUpdated(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when LINK/ETH price feed is updated."},"PresaleShutdown()":{"notice":"Emitted when presale shutdown is queued."},"SubscriptionCancelled(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a VRF subscription is cancelled."},"SubscriptionCreated(uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new VRF subscription is created."},"SubscriptionShutdown(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when subscription is shutdown and LINK swept."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"coordinator()":{"notice":"Current VRF coordinator address."},"emergencyRecover(address,bytes32)":{"notice":"Migrate to a new VRF coordinator/subscription after 3-day stall."},"linkEthPriceFeed()":{"notice":"Chainlink LINK/ETH price feed address."},"onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"ERC-677 callback: handles LINK donations to fund VRF subscription."},"setLinkEthPriceFeed(address)":{"notice":"Configure the LINK/ETH price feed for LINK donation valuation."},"setPresaleMintingEnabled(bool)":{"notice":"Enable or disable presale minting (tokens/maps)."},"setRewardStakeTargetBps(uint16)":{"notice":"Configure the target stETH share (in bps) for ContractAddresses.GAME-held liquidity; 0 disables staking."},"shutdownAndRefund(address)":{"notice":"Cancel VRF subscription and sweep LINK after ContractAddresses.GAME-over."},"shutdownPresale()":{"notice":"Queue presale shutdown after the next jackpot time."},"stakeGameEthToStEth(uint256)":{"notice":"Stake ContractAddresses.GAME-held ETH into stETH via Lido."},"subscriptionId()":{"notice":"Current VRF subscription ID."},"swapGameEthForStEth(uint256)":{"notice":"Swap owner ETH for ContractAddresses.GAME-held stETH (1:1 exchange)."},"vrfKeyHash()":{"notice":"VRF key hash for the current coordinator."},"wireVrf(address,uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Initialize VRF configuration and wire ContractAddresses.GAME consumer."}},"notice":"Central admin contract: owns the VRF subscription and wires VRF         configuration for the ContractAddresses.GAME. Deployed using precomputed constants.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/DegenerusAdmin.sol":"DegenerusAdmin"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"details":{"constantOptimizer":true,"cse":true,"deduplicate":true,"inliner":true,"jumpdestRemover":true,"orderLiterals":true,"peephole":true,"simpleCounterForLoopUncheckedIncrement":true,"yul":true,"yulDetails":{"optimizerSteps":"dhfoDgvulfnTUtnIf:fDnTOcmuO","stackAllocation":true}},"runs":200},"remappings":[":@arbitrum/=node_modules/@arbitrum/",":@chainlink/=node_modules/@chainlink/",":@eth-optimism/=node_modules/@chainlink/contracts/node_modules/@eth-optimism/",":@offchainlabs/=node_modules/@offchainlabs/",":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":@scroll-tech/=node_modules/@scroll-tech/",":@zksync/=node_modules/@zksync/",":erc721a/=node_modules/erc721a/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/",":solady/=node_modules/solady/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/ContractAddresses.sol":{"keccak256":"0x773c919574c05ba618701fedbdae4175a3605a5847981e752037c2278a0c06ed","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d53147d50f52792abe4b0a369cfd5a0f17e0ad73d2ef9be739520b6771870f79","dweb:/ipfs/QmYRCpkAjDpvN23n3jyzt2QtwgdDmVB7WT7X1ch6BCH2UV"]},"contracts/DegenerusAdmin.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2f354dc2af7517634bfdc16f7367c180e3a8fa3f2eae9620681b407774c7c7da","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c5825e16c3380cf194771f8be13442f4de799ca3b1357e8709815096836baf53","dweb:/ipfs/QmZi2yEUShZHB54NLY6BXzrN3G4k9TPBuag2n833vtFins"]}},"version":1}

emergencyRecover(address,bytes32).details: Emergency recovery path when Chainlink VRF becomes unavailable.      EXECUTION ORDER:      1. Verify 3-day stall via ContractAddresses.GAME.rngStalledForThreeDays()      2. Cancel old subscription (LINK refunds to this contract)      3. Create new subscription on new coordinator      4. Add ContractAddresses.GAME as consumer      5. Push new config to game      6. Transfer any LINK balance to new subscription      SECURITY NOTES:      - 3-day stall requirement prevents premature migration.      - try/catch on cancelSubscription handles edge cases.      - New coordinator/keyHash must be non-zero.      - Game is updated atomically.

params.newCoordinator: Address of the new VRF coordinator.
params.newKeyHash: Key hash for the new coordinator.

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: Called automatically when LINK is transferred via transferAndCall().      FLOW:      1. Validate sender is LINK token contract      2. Forward LINK to VRF subscription      3. Calculate reward multiplier based on subscription balance      4. Convert LINK to ETH-equivalent using price feed      5. Credit BURNIE reward to donor (live ContractAddresses.COIN)      SECURITY NOTES:      - msg.sender validation prevents fake LINK attacks.      - GameOver guard prevents donations after ContractAddresses.GAME ends.      - Multiplier decreases as subscription fills (incentivizes early donations).      - No rewards if price feed unavailable.

setLinkEthPriceFeed(address).details: Zero address disables oracle-based valuation (LINK donations earn no rewards).      Only replaceable if current feed is unhealthy (prevents unnecessary changes).      SECURITY NOTES:      - FeedHealthy guard prevents changing a working feed.      - Decimal normalization handles feeds with different precisions.      - Invalid feed data (answer <= 0) causes _linkAmountToEth to return 0.

params.feed: New price feed address (zero to disable).

shutdownAndRefund(address).details: Final cleanup function. No VRF stall required  only ContractAddresses.GAME-over flag.      SECURITY NOTES:      - Requires gameOverEntropyAttempted() to be true.      - LINK refunded to specified target address.      - Sets subscriptionId to 0 to prevent re-use.

params.target: Address to receive the LINK refund.

stakeGameEthToStEth(uint256).details: Converts idle ETH to yield-bearing stETH.

swapGameEthForStEth(uint256).details: Allows owner to provide ETH liquidity in exchange for stETH yield.      SECURITY NOTES:      - msg.value must exactly equal amount parameter.      - stETH sent to msg.sender (owner), not arbitrary address.      - Game contract validates the swap internally.

wireVrf(address,uint256,bytes32).details: If subId is zero, a new subscription is created on the coordinator.      Subsequent calls must match existing config.

params.subId: Existing VRF subscription ID (0 to create).

emergencyRecover(address,bytes32).notice: Migrate to a new VRF coordinator/subscription after 3-day stall.

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).notice: ERC-677 callback: handles LINK donations to fund VRF subscription.

setLinkEthPriceFeed(address).notice: Configure the LINK/ETH price feed for LINK donation valuation.

setRewardStakeTargetBps(uint16).notice: Configure the target stETH share (in bps) for ContractAddresses.GAME-held liquidity; 0 disables staking.

shutdownAndRefund(address).notice: Cancel VRF subscription and sweep LINK after ContractAddresses.GAME-over.

shutdownPresale().notice: Queue presale shutdown after the next jackpot time.

stakeGameEthToStEth(uint256).notice: Stake ContractAddresses.GAME-held ETH into stETH via Lido.

swapGameEthForStEth(uint256).notice: Swap owner ETH for ContractAddresses.GAME-held stETH (1:1 exchange).

vrfKeyHash().notice: VRF key hash for the current coordinator.

wireVrf(address,uint256,bytes32).notice: Initialize VRF configuration and wire ContractAddresses.GAME consumer.
